DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Vaccines make peptide may make body build immune response kill tumor cell . Combining vaccine therapy interleukin-2 and/or sargramostim may effective treatment solid tumor . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness vaccine therapy plus interleukin-2 and/or sargramostim treat adult metastatic solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Vaccine Therapy Plus Biological Therapy Treating Adults With Metastatic Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine whether endogenous cellular immunity tumor-specific mutate ra protein present cancer patient . - Determine whether vaccination synthetic peptide correspond tumor 's ras mutation DetoxPC adjuvant , interleukin-2 ( IL-2 ) , and/or sargramostim ( GM-CSF ) induce boost patient 's cellular immunity particular mutation . - Determine type characteristic cellular immune response generate . - Determine tolerance toxicity spectrum peptide give DetoxPC adjuvant along IL-2 and/or GM-CSF . - Correlate immune response tumor response patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : Patients assign one three treatment group . - Group I ( close accrual 6/4/01 ) : Patients receive tumor-specific ra peptide vaccine DetoxPC subcutaneously ( SC ) every 5 week 3 course . Beginning 4 day vaccination , patient receive interleukin-2 ( IL-2 ) SC 5 day week 2 week . - Group II ( close accrual 6/4/01 ) : Patients receive sargramostim ( GM-CSF ) SC daily begin 1 day prior vaccination continue 4 day . Patients receive vaccination group I immediately follow GM-CSF day 2 . Patients vaccinate every 4 week 3 course . - Group III : Patients receive vaccination IL-2 group I GM-CSF group II . In group , patient receive 15 vaccination absence disease progression . Patients follow every 2 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A maximum 60 patient ( 20 per treatment group ) accrue study within 2-4 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm solid tumor potentially express mutant ra , include colon , lung , pancreas , thyroid , endometrial , head neck , testicular , hepatocellular , melanoma Ras mutation must one follow point mutation codon 12 : Glycine cysteine Glycine aspartic acid Glycine valine Metastatic disease know chemotherapy radiotherapy would increase survival Tumor tissue must available determination ra mutation No prior CNS metastases PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : ECOG 01 Life expectancy : More 3 month Hematopoietic : WBC least 2,000/mm^3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm^3 Hepatic : Bilirubin great 2.0 mg/dL SGOT/SGPT great 4 time normal No hepatitis B C infection Renal : Creatinine great 2.0 mg/dL Cardiovascular : No active ischemic heart disease ( New York Heart Association class III IV ) No myocardial infarction within past 6 month No history congestive heart failure , ventricular arrhythmia , arrhythmias require therapy Immunologic : No prior allergy egg No prior autoimmune disease , include follow : Autoimmune neutropenia , thrombocytopenia , hemolytic anemia Systemic lupus erythematosus , Sjogren 's syndrome , scleroderma Myasthenia gravis Goodpasture syndrome Addison 's disease , Hashimoto 's thyroiditis , active Graves ' disease Other : Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception HIV negative No active malignancy except curatively treat carcinoma situ cervix basal cell skin cancer No active infection require antibiotic No medical condition would preclude study PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : At least 4 week since prior immunotherapy recover Chemotherapy : See Disease Characteristics At least 4 week since prior chemotherapy recover Endocrine therapy : At least 4 week since prior steroid recover Radiotherapy : See Disease Characteristics At least 4 week since prior radiotherapy recover Surgery : Not specify
